drugs.symptom: I'm having acute pain and minor fever. Can you help?
There's a painful swelling in my right leg. It came after sitting in an airplane for 8 hours!
I have a burning sensation with urinating, it hurts!
My left ear is aching and there's yellow slime inside. Help!
*Cough* I have a fever and a very slimy throat, can you help?
I have asthma and I need medicine! *Cough cough*
I have diabetes and I need my medication!
I have chronic joint pain and stiffness
Tiredness, skin dryness, swelling in eyes, face and legs, weight gain, feeling chilly
My spring allergies are coming back. *sneeze* Can you help?
Heightened bloodpressure on a pregnant woman
I'm on my seventh month of pregnancy and I'm having many strong and painful contractions!
